de.muspellheim.commons.fx

Class StageController<V extends javafx.scene.Parent,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.muspellheim.commons.fx.StageController<V,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of root view in stages scene
    C - the type of view controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutDialogController

    public class StageController<V extends javafx.scene.Parent,C>
extends java.lang.Object
    Stage controller for a stage holding a view controller for root of stages scene.

    The stage controller can be used as is or it can be extended, see init(Parent, Object).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StageController(java.lang.Class<C> controllerType)
      Create a stage controller with a new stage.
      StageController(@NonNull java.lang.Class<C> controllerType, @NonNull javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Create a stage controller with a existing stage.
